definition: Buddha (a person who has attained Buddhahood, or specifically Siddhartha Gautama)

sentences.english: The Buddha takes his last offerings and makes your perfect in danaparamita. well done, Cunda!
sentences.chinese: 佛陀接受了他的最後的供養並且因爲佈施而使你最好。

sentences.english: And prince Siddhartha became the "Buddha" in eastern India.
sentences.chinese: 悉達多王子在印度東部成爲“佛陀”。

sentences.english: Oh Buddha, why did you give him such a great blessing?
sentences.chinese: 佛陀你爲何還要爲他授記？

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism also holds the notion that Precious Umbrella symbolizes the power of Buddha's edification.
sentences.chinese: 藏傳佛教亦認爲，寶傘象徵着佛陀教誨的權威。

sentences.english: I know the Buddha was right, so Krishnamurti is wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我知道佛陀是對的，因此克里希那穆提是錯的。

sentences.english: Shi Han is inters the Buddha Buddhist relics the most outer layer sarcophagus.
sentences.chinese: 石函是安葬佛陀舍利的最外層石棺。

sentences.english: Buddhism is the religion founded by Buddha in North India.
sentences.chinese: 梵學是佛陀初創於印度南部之宗學。

sentences.english: Buddha's instruction of one-meal-a-day is to help us to reduce our desire and it does not affect our health.
sentences.chinese: 佛陀所制定的日中一食是有助於我們減少我們的慾望。

sentences.english: According to the Buddha's claim, this is the ninth stage of Samadhi, reached for the first time by him.
sentences.chinese: 根據佛陀的宣道，這裏有九層三摩地，他第一個達到。

sentences.english: Now they have removed one idea of Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他們屏除了過去有關佛陀的一些想法。

sentences.english: Through the power of the merit here produced by my reverence for the Buddha, may all my obstructions cease to be.
sentences.chinese: 以我在此禮敬佛陀的功德之力，願我的一切障礙止息。

sentences.english: Because Buddha and Jesus emphasise effort and Chuang Tzu emphasises effortlessness.
sentences.chinese: 因爲佛陀與耶穌主張有爲，而莊子強調的是無爲。

sentences.english: In most Buddhist traditions, he is considered the Supreme Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 傳統上，大多數佛教徒認爲他是至聖佛陀。

sentences.english: So he approached the Lord Buddha and requested ordination as a Bhikkhu.
sentences.chinese: 於是他靠近佛陀，請求受戒成爲比丘。

sentences.english: The Buddha's heir, aware and mindful.
sentences.chinese: 以正念明覺，爲佛陀的法的繼承人。
